channel.title: Debug Mode on 4wayhandshake
channel.description: Recent content in Debug Mode on 4wayhandshake

item.title: Cybermonday
item.description: INTRODUCTION At the time of writing this walkthrough, Cybermondaywas just released! It is the ninth box for HTB’s Hackers Clash: Open Beta Season II. The site is a fictional e-commerce site. This box will test your knowledge of SQL, broken authentication, and definitely all the JWT tricks you can imagine! Have fun. RECON nmap scans For this box, I’m running the same enumeration strategy as the previous boxes in the Open Beta Season II.
